Posts.Content: May 30, 2013 06:07AM deedee2604 wrote: I go to my breast surgeon today.  I have a pink breast with texture changes.  Hoping it is some strange post lumpectomy phenomenon and not IBC.  Haven't had any testing done yet.  I fear the worst since the affected area is opposite my lumpectomy site and I've already had a round of antibiotics.  Thanks for listening!
Posts.Title: just a shout out to everyone waiting over this long weekend - debmc1958 anastaisa99
